description: This is a sample nccapy project configuration file
It will install nccapy, PILLOW (pil) and numpy packages
This is the ideal starting place for 1st Year Procedural Content Creation projects

templates: auto activate the virtual env on cd

description: This is a sample machine learning project configuration file
It will install numpy, pandas,polars PyTorch, and matplotlib packages
This is the ideal starting place for SE For Media Projects

templates: auto activate the virtual env on cd
pyproject_extras: { index = 'pytorch-cu124', marker = 'sys_platform == 'linux' or sys_platform == 'win32'' },  # Use CUDA on Linux/Windows
